examples.application/json: // 20180529135354// https://pelias.dev.dev.east.paas.geointservices.io/v1/place?ids=whosonfirst:country{  "geocoding": {    "version": "0.2",    "attribution": "/v1/attribution",    "query": {      "private": false,      "lang": {        "name": "English",        "iso6391": "en",        "iso6393": "eng",        "defaulted": false      }    },    "errors": [      "id `whosonfirst:country is invalid: must be of the format source:layer:id for ex: 'geonames:venue:4163334'"    ],    "engine": {      "name": "Pelias",      "author": "Mapzen",      "version": "1.0"    },    "timestamp": 1527616433967  },  "type": "FeatureCollection",  "features": [      ]}

// 20180529091006// http://localhost:4000/v1/autocomplete?text=highland%20dwel{  "geocoding": {    "version": "0.2",    "attribution": "http://pelias.mapzen.com/v1/attribution",    "query": {      "text": "highland dwel",      "parser": "addressit",      "tokens": [        "highland",        "dwel"      ],      "size": 10,      "private": false,      "lang": {        "name": "English",        "iso6391": "en",        "iso6393": "eng",        "defaulted": false      }    },    "engine": {      "name": "Pelias",      "author": "Mapzen",      "version": "1.0"    },    "timestamp": 1527599406179  },  "type": "FeatureCollection",  "features": [    {      "type": "Feature",      "geometry": {        "type": "Point",        "coordinates": [          -76.996265,          38.831031        ]      },      "properties": {        "id": "387155235",        "gid": "whosonfirst:venue:387155235",        "layer": "venue",        "source": "whosonfirst",        "source_id": "387155235",        "name": "Highland Dwellings Residents",        "accuracy": "point",        "country": "United States",        "country_gid": "whosonfirst:country:85633793",        "country_a": "USA",        "region": "District of Columbia",        "region_gid": "whosonfirst:region:85688741",        "region_a": "DC",        "county": "District of Columbia",        "county_gid": "whosonfirst:county:102084889",        "locality": "Washington",        "locality_gid": "whosonfirst:locality:85931779",        "neighbourhood": "Washington Highlands",        "neighbourhood_gid": "whosonfirst:neighbourhood:1108724029",        "continent": "North America",        "continent_gid": "whosonfirst:continent:102191575",        "label": "Highland Dwellings Residents, Washington, DC, USA"      },      "bbox": [        -76.996265,        38.831031,        -76.996265,        38.831031      ]    }  ],  "bbox": [    -76.996265,    38.831031,    -76.996265,    38.831031  ]}
